maqras.text: 44|17|haey chea karpit nasa  yeung ban sakalbong krom robsa  hvie r aon moun puokke( puok mou sh ri ki n)towtiet  daoy anakneasar  mneak da thlaithnaur( mou sa) ban mokkan puokke .

44|18|( mou sa ban pol tha)  chaur puok anak brakl  banda khnhom robsa  a l laoh( ambaur aisreael) mk aoy khnhom vinh phng .  pitabrakd nasa  khnhom chea anakneasar mneak del chea ti touk chetd bamphot samreab puok anak .
44|19|haey chaur puok anak kom kraeutakratm champoh a l laoh aoy  saoh .  pitabrakd nasa  khnhom chea anak del noam phosdo tang yeang cheak  chbasa mk aoy puok anak .
44|20|haey pitabrakd nasa  khnhom som pi mcheasa robsakhnhom  ning chea mcheasa  robsa puok anak aoy karpar khnhom komaoy puok anak kb khnhom nung dom thm .
44|21|haey brasenbae puok anak min chue khnhom te noh  saum puok anak touk  aoy khnhom now mneakeng choh .
44|22|pelnoh  keat( mou sa) ban pol towkean mcheasa robsa  keat tha  pitabrakd nasa  puok teangnoh kuchea krom del br pru td  babakamm .

44|23|( a l laoh mean bantoul tb vinh tha)  dau che  neah chaur anak( mou sa)  noam khnhom teanglay robsa yeung( anak mean chomnue) chakchenh nowpel yb  choh .  puok anak pitchea nung trauv ke denh tam .
44|24|haey chaur anak( mou sa) touk aoy tukasamoutr noh mean chanloh  dauchnih choh .  pitabrakd nasa  puokke kuchea krom teahean del trauv ke  ponlich( nowknong samoutr) .
44|25|cheachraen mk haey del puokke ban bansaoltouk nouv suonochbar  ning braphp tuk .
44|26|ning chamkar  haeyning phoumikruah da braneit  .
44|27|promteang sechakdeisokh del puokke thleab ttuol ban nowknong  lokey nih .
44|28|dauchnaoh der  yeung ban bansaol vea toukchea morotk dl krom dtei  tiet .
44|29|haey mekh ning phendei minban yom sranaoh champoh puokke laey  haey puokke ka min trauv ban ke ponyearpel( daktondakamm)  der .
44|30|haey chea karpit nasa  yeung ban chuoyosangkroh ambaur  aisreael ampi tondakamm da ameasa .
44|31|( ku tondakamm) robsa hvie r aon .  pitabrakd nasa  ke kuchea anak del kraeutakratm mneak knongchamnaom puok del bampean .
44|32|haey chea karpit nasa  yeung ban chreusareusa puokke ( ambaur aisreael) aoy krobkrong piphoplok( now samy noh)  tam kar doeng robsa yeung .
44|33|haey yeung ban phdal mou chi hsaa t cheachraen dl puokke daoy  knong noh mean karsaakalbong yeang chbasaleasa .
44|34|pitabrakd nasa  puok teangnih( puok kmean chomnue kou r sh)nung  niyeay tha
44|35|vea kmeanoavei krawpi sechakdeislab leuktimuoy robsa puok yeung  noh laey  haey puok yeung ka min trauv ban ke thveu aoy rsa laengvinh  der .

44|36|( puokke ban niyeay tiet tha)  dau che  neah chaur puok anak( mou ha-meat  ning anak del mean chomnue) noam yk chidaunchitea robsa puok yeung  tralbmokvinh meul.  brasenbae puok anakchea anak niyeaypit men  noh .

44|37|tae puokke( puok kmean chomnue kou r sh) brasaer cheang  ryy krom ambaur  tob bak( krom muoy del mk pi ye men)  ning anak chomnean moun puokke  brasaer cheang?  yeung ban bamphlanh puokke daoysaarte puokke cheapuok  del br pru td babakamm .
44|38|yeung minban bangkeut mekh cheachraen chean  ning phendei haey  ning avei  del mean now rveang vea teangpir chea kar lengsaech laey .
44|39|haey yeung minban bangkeut vea teangpir  krawpi karpit noh  te .  kabonde puokke pheakochraen mindoeng laey .
44|40|pitabrakd nasa  thngai katsechakdei  kuchea pelkamnt chuob  robsa puokke teangoasaknea .
44|41|kuchea thngai del nheatesandean min ach chuoy avei dl knea ban laey  haey puokke ka min trauv ban ke chuoy der .
44|42|leuklengte anaknea del a l laoh ban anet  sraleanh bonnaoh .  pitabrakd nasa  trong mha khlangpouke mha  anet sraleanh .
44|43|pitabrakd nasa  daem hsaoe k kou m( daemchheu nowknong nork)
44|44|chea chamnei samreab puok br pru td babakamm chraen .
44|45|( del mean kam daw khlang) dauch saamn kampoung pouh nowknong poh .
44|46|dauch tukpouh da sen kdaw .
44|47|chaur puok anak( mea la ai kat) chab yk ke( anak del br pru td  ampeubeab)  haey teanh ke baoh tow kandal nork cheu hi m .
44|48|banteabmk  chaur puok anak chak tearounakamm ampi tuk da sen kdaw  towleu kbal robsa ke choh .
44|49|chaur anak phloksa choh  pitabrakd nasa  anak kuchea chn del khlang pouke  ning thlaithnaur( nowknong lokey) .
44|50|pitabrakd nasa  nih kuchea avei( tearounakamm) del puok anak  thleab sangsay champoh vea( nowknong lokey) .
44|51|pitabrakd nasa  banda anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh vinh  ku sthetnow kanleng muoy del mean sovotthephap bamphot .
44|52|ku nowknong thansuokr  haey mean braphp tuk cheachraen .
44|53|puokke sliekpeak sautr del mdthakhai  ning kreum daoy puokke  angkouy now tlmoukhaknea .
44|54|dau che  neah der  yeung ban rieb apa pipea aoy puokke cheamuoy  nung sreitepoabsaar .
44|55|nowknong thansuokr noh  puokke ach som ban nouv real braphet  phlechheu daoy sovotthephap bamphot .
44|56|nowknong noh der  puokke min skal rosacheate nei kar slab kraw  pi kar slab leuktimuoy( nowknong lokey) noh laey .  haey trong  ban theroksaa puokke pi tearounakamm nei nork cheu hi m .
44|57|chea kar braosa bratan pi mcheasa robsa anak .  noh kuchea  chokchy da thomtheng .
44|58|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban samruol vea( kompir kuor an)chea  pheasaea robsa anak  daembi aoy puokke changcham .
44|59|dau che  neah  chaur anak( mou ham meat) rngcha( nouv avei del yeung ban  sanyea champoh anak)choh  pitabrakd nasa puokke ka chea anak rngcham der .
45|1|ha  mi m
45|2|kar banhchouh kompir( kuor an) nih ku mk pi a l laoh del mha khlangpouke  mha ktebandet .
45|3|pitabrakd nasa  now leumekh cheachraen chean  ning phendei kuchea  phosdo tang  samreab banda anak del mean chomnue .
45|4|haey nowknong kar bangkeut puok anak  ning satv teanglay del  trong dak pongreay( now leu phendei)noh  kuchea phosdo tang  samreab  krom del mean chomnue yeang pitabrakd .

45|5|haey karophlasabdaur rveang peloyb ning pelothngai  ning leaph  sakkar( tukaphlieng) del a l laoh ban banhchouh pileu mekh haey  daoysaar vea trong ban thveu aoy dei meanchivit laengvinh banteabpi kar slab ( kmean chicheate) robsa vea  promteang karophlasabdaur tisa robsa khyal noh  chea phosdo tang  samreab krom del svengoyl .

45|6|teangnoh kuchea phosdo tang robsa a l laoh del yeung niyeay  brab anak( mou ham meat) yeang pitabrakd .  dau che  neah  tae mean peakyasaamdei  na kraoypi peakyasaamdei a l laoh  ning phosdo tang  robsa trong del  puokke mean chomnue noh
45|7|vineasa a nd reay champoh real anak del phout kohk ning anak del  br pru td babakamm chraen .

45|8|daoy ke sdablyy ayeat  robsa a l laoh del trauv ban ke  sautr aoy sdab  banteabmk ke nowte chchesa daoy kraeutakratm hakbei  dauchchea ke minban sdablyy vea saoh .  dau che  neah chaur anak( mou ham meat)phdal  damnoeng dl ke nouv tearounakamm da chhucheab .
45|9|haey nowpel delke ban doeng aveimuoy ampi ayeat  robsa yeung  ke bercha ban yk vea thveuchea kar chamak towvinh .  puok teangnoh  nung ttuol tearounakamm da ameasa .

45|10|now khangmoukh puokke ku nork cheu han nam .  haey avei del puok  ke ban br pru td  ning avei del puokke ban yk thveuchea anak keapear phe  sa ngpi  a l laoh noh  ku min ach karpar puokke ban b ndi ch saoh laey .  haey puokke nung ttuol tearounakamm da thngonthngor .
45|11|( kompir kuor an) nih kuchea kar changaoulobangheanh .  haey puok  del brachheang nung ayeat  nei mcheasa robsa puokke noh  puokke nung  ttuol tearounakamm da sen chhucheab .
